gameDetails.name: The Fox Experiment: Patron and Science Promo Cards
gameDetails.description:
Includes 1 double sided Patron Card and 2 Science Cards. The Science Cards have the same effect, but different flavor text.

The new Patron card:

Side A: Earn 8 points if you have no other Sponsors claimed
 Side B: Earn 8 points if none of the pups you created in the last round have a friendliness score of less than 13

The new Science card:

When scoring studies: You may assign 1 pup to 2 study levels. (This may be 2 levels of 1 study, or 1 level of 2 different studies.)
